Sept. 10, 1938 D Long Eaton Contest
Long Eaton Contest 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Long Eaton Contest long-eaton-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Balfe
Recreation Ground, Long Eaton Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £6 and cup, 3rd £4, 4th £2. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£1) Ripley United, 2nd(10s.) Stanton. Promoted on behalf of Long Eaton Hospital 9 bands competed.
Nov. 20, 2013, 3:54 p.m. Jan. 24, 2014, 2:20 p.m.
1 Ilkeston Brass John Turner Recollections of Balfe
2 Ripley United Silver Prize Band W. J. Saint
3 Loscoe Miners J. C. Webster
4 Rolls Royce (Derby) Band H. D. Parker
